library(tidyverse)
dat <- read_rds("../datasets/lincoln_temps.rds")
data <- dat %>% 
  select(date, month, month_long, mean_temp) %>%
  group_by(month) %>%
  summarise(mean_temp = mean(mean_temp))
data
ggplot(data, aes(month, mean_temp)) + 
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "The mean temperature each month in 2016", subtitle ="U = Â°F", x = "month", y = "mean temperature")
